parameters: \nd<Mom>I have failed, dear... I have failed to save
\nd<Mysterious Flame>Where is your son? Where is he?
\nd<Dad>What do you want??!! My son isn't here!
Just tell me or I will ruin this town!!
\nd<Damian>My bad feeling was right after all.
Mysterious Flame has kidnapped Marcus' Dad,
and from that incident, Marcus lost his consciousness,
then his friend took him to a nearest inn for recover.
